name: Jeffrey Osborne
description: '''Jeffrey Linton Osborne''' (born March 9, 1948) is an American singer-songwriter, musician and lyricist. He is the former drummer and lead singer of the American R&B/soul group [[L.T.D. (band)|L.T.D.]], with whom he began his musical career in 1970. In 2024, Osborne was inducted into the [[Rhythm and Blues Music Hall of Fame]].
